title: H5P-Based Language Learning Simulation: Online Engagement Enhancement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and digital learning tool application experience
context.additional_context: Language education program conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, enhancing active participation and collaborative problem-solving skills via project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply language concepts with over 80% accuracy through H5P interactive activities.
Learners can successfully complete language utilization scenarios in a VR simulation environment at least three times.
Learners can demonstrate collaborative competencies by submitting peer feedback-based project outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
